channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP_SE -- SAP CRM (WebClient UI)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP_SE -- SAP CRM (WebClient UI)

item.title: CVE-2024-24742|2024-02-13T02:42:56.483Z -- SAP_SE -- SAP CRM (WebClient UI)
item.description: SAP CRM WebClient UIÂ - version S4FND 102, S4FND 103, S4FND 104, S4FND 105, S4FND 106, WEBCUIF 701, WEBCUIF 731, WEBCUIF 746, WEBCUIF 747, WEBCUIF 748, WEBCUIF 800, WEBCUIF 801, does not sufficiently encode user-controlled inputs, resulting in Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability. An attacker with low privileges can cause limited impact to integrity of the application data after successful exploitation. There is no impact on confidentiality and availability.
